name: Spheres (victords)
description:
Spheres is a simple - but addictive - match-3 game with 3 different game modes to keep you playing!

Try the basic mode to get the basics of the game and to go for the highest scores! Spheres keep falling from the sky and you have to align 3 or more of the same color horizontally or vertically. Try causing chain reactions to get exponentially more points!

If you want more action and variety, go for the dynamic mode. Use items, avoid locks and locked spheres and combine the rainbow spheres wisely!

Finally, if you're more into puzzles, the static mode is for you. No falling spheres this time, just a set of spheres in each level, requiring you to either clear them all or get a minimum score. Some of these levels require lots of planning for insane chain reactions!

Spheres is free and open source. Check the source code here.
